definitions.definition: A kind of vehicle used for conveying timber and heavy articles.
A trace, or drawing strap, of a harness.
An iron hook of a hoisting tub, to which a tackle is affixed.

definitions.example: He had a quick tug to calm himself down before his date.

definitions.definition: To pull or drag with great effort
definitions.example: The police officers tugged the drunkard out of the pub.
He lost his patience trying to undo his shoe-lace, but tugging it made the knot even tighter.
